query:
介绍一下Leinao这家中国Hefei的公司产品。
他主要做Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology方面的业务方面。
我需要他进一步的产品介绍，功能介绍，官网链接，服务的客户
answer: Leinao (中科类脑智能技术有限公司), founded in 2017 and headquartered in the Hefei Hi‑Tech Zone, is a Chinese AI and information‑technology firm that has concentrated its business on the energy sector, delivering end‑to‑end intelligent power‑grid and smart‑energy solutions; its core product suite includes an AI‑driven Intelligent Diagnostics platform for real‑time fault detection and predictive maintenance, a Smart Energy Decision‑Making system that optimizes generation‑dispatch and load balancing, a Lifecycle Management platform that oversees equipment health, performance analytics and asset retirement, and an integrated Smart Grid Operations Center that unifies monitoring, control and security across transmission and distribution networks—these products are built on a vertical AI “landing loop” that combines data acquisition, deep‑learning models, and cloud‑native orchestration; Leinao’s services are primarily targeted at utilities, grid operators and power‑plant owners such as State Grid, China Southern Power Grid and major independent power producers, and the company’s official website is https://www.leinao.ai (about page: https://www.leinao.ai/about).

results.title: Leinao - Products, Competitors, Financials, Employees, Headquarters ...
results.content:
Leinao specializes in artificial intelligence and smart energy solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a range of AI-driven products and services designed to enhance the efficiency and safety of power systems, including intelligent diagnostics, smart energy decision-making, and lifecycle management. Leinao primarily serves the energy sector with its smart grid and power management solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Hefei, China.

image

image [...] More than 50 cases related to Volcano have been implemented. These cases are widely distributed in industries such as Internet, advanced manufacturing, finance, life sciences, scientific research, autonomous driving, and medicine. They cover massive data computing and analysis scenarios like AI, big data, genomic sequencing, and rendering. The main users are Tencent, Amazon, ING Bank, Baidu, Xiaohongshu, DiDi, 360, iQIYI, Leinao, Pengcheng Laboratory, Cruise, Li Auto, Unisound, Ximalaya, [...] Chang Feng, head of the Leinao R&D Center, said, “Volcano is one of the first open source cloud native projects for batch computing. It has dynamically configurable advanced scheduling policies and excellent resource management capabilities, which can address multiple challenges, like job scheduling, lifecycle management, and heterogeneous hardware support in AI scenarios. Alibaba’s DAMO Academy (阿里巴巴达摩院), a branch of the e-commerce company, was founded in 2017 with facilities in Beijing, Hangzhou, and five sites abroad.57 Its director is Zhang Jianfeng (张建锋), president of Alibaba Cloud Intelligence (阿里云智能). The academy hosts 16 laboratories researching eve­ rying from machine intelligence (机器智能) to quantum.58 In June 2021, [...] 155 BSBII operates BCI and “brain atlas big data” platforms. Research includes macro- and mesoscopic connectomics, BI-AI, and brain-inspired computing devices.

results.title: Leena AI unveils conversational AI 'colleagues' for the enterprise
results.content:
Powered by Gemini and two orchestrator large language models (LLMs) fine-tuned on GPT-4.1, with ServiceNow, Workday, SAP, Oracle, ADP, Salesforce, and other integrations, the AI colleagues understand context and past conversations, and update themselves regularly to provide human-like discussions.

In one product demo, a worker sitting in a busy lobby interacted with Leena on his mobile phone, saying “Hi Leena, I just spilled a drink on my laptop. Can you order me another one?” [...] Use cases span IT, HR, finance, marketing, sales, and procurement, Jain said, noting that the company serves customers across industries including finance, manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, and consumer and packaged goods. Jain said one chief experience officer (CXO) at a major industrial company predicted that incorporating voice-enabled AI colleagues could boost the productivity of IT and HR teams by 50%.
